info.title: Loan Contract Borrower Party Change Request
info.description:
A request from the borrower to a lender (financial institution) to change the borrower of a loan contract immediately. A loan contract borrower party change request also supports the transfer of due items from the previous borrower to the new borrower.


Note:
The entity data model for loan contract borrower party change request contains a subset of the attributes of the business object of loan contract borrower party change request.

Remark:
The service Loan Contract Borrower Party Change Request is assigned to service group Transactional Banking.

Use:
A Loan Contract Borrower Party Change Request is used to propose, create and display borrower party change requests. The propose loan contract borrower party change request is used to query default values for reason code, correspondence required indicators for new and former borrower party, charge waiver requested indicator and additional data like activity codes and checklist item codes for creation of a loan contract borrower party change request.

x-sap-shortText: Manage borrower party change requests for loan contracts using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Loan Contract Borrower Party Change Request

post.summary: Proposed Loan Contract Borrower Party Change Request
post.description: Is the return for ProposeByLoanContractUUID action. This will hold the default values, activites which can be performed along with borrower party change and checklist itemthat needs to be taken into account by the service consumer within the process of the loan contract borrower party change request.
tags: Loan Contract Borrower Party Change Requests

LoanContractUUID.title: A globally unique identifier for a LoanContract.

schema.title: Proposed Loan Contract Borrower Party Change Request
schema.description: A ProposedLoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequest is the return for the ProposeByLoanContractUUID action. This will hold the default values, activites which can be performed along with borrower party change and checklist itemthat needs to be taken into account by the service consumer within the process of the loan contract borrower party change request.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator--

Code.title: Checklistitem Code is a coded representation of a item in a checklist that needs to be considered before completion of the loan contract borrower party change request.

Name.example: Pending loan contract payoff request existence

Description.example: A pending loan contract payoff request exists
Description.title: Is a detailed description of a loan contract borrower party change request checklist item.

ReasonCode.description:

BusinessProcessChainAssignment.title: BusinessProcessChainAssignment is the assignment of a business object node to a business process chain.
BusinessProcessChainAssignment.description:
BusinessProcessChain is a chain of business processes carried out in a business scenario.
BOCT: BusProcChnAssgmt

NewBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements.title: NewBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements is a party that legally holds a bank account associated with the loan contract after completion of the borrower party change request.
NewBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements.description:
Constraint 1: The new borrower party must differ from the former borrower party
Constraint 2: The party that is defined as new borrower party must have the role account holder party.
BOCT: PartyIdfgElmnts

FormerBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements.title: FormerBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements is a party that legally holds a bank account associated with the loan contract before completion of the borrower party change request.

NewClearingBankAccountContractUUID.title: NewClearingBankAccountContractUUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account contract.
NewClearingBankAccountContractUUID.description:
A clearing bank account contract is a the bank account contract that receives incoming payments that have to be transferred to a specific loan contract.
GDT: NOSC_UUID

ChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator.title: ChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator indicates whether a charge for activation of a loan contract borrower party change request is requested to be waived or not.

CompletionDate.title: The CompletionDate is the date on which a loan contract borrower party change request is completed.
CompletionDate.description:
Constraint: The CompletionDate is set if LifeCycleStatusCode is 03 (Completed).
GDT: Date

PartyUUID.title: The UUID of a party (business partner)
PartyUUID.description: Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. Only one filter value for PartyUUID can be specified. If filter value for PartyUUID is specified, additional filtering for PartyID is not possible.NOSC_UUID

PartyID.title: The ID of a party (business partner)
PartyID.description: Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. Only one filter value for PartyID can be specified. If filter value for PartyID is specified, additional filtering for PartyUUID is not possible.GDT: PartyID

com.sap.gateway.default.lcborrowerpartyc.title: PartyIdentifyingElements does contain all identifying elements of a party (business partner)
com.sap.gateway.default.lcborrowerpartyc.description:
Remark:
PartyTypeCode value 147 "Business Partner" is supported.
Integrity Condition: Either PartyUUID or PartyID must be specified during creation of a loan contract.
